title: Making A Murderer
description: This documentary series follows Steven Avery, who was wrongfully convicted of a crime, and his subsequent fight for justice after being accused of another crime.

title: Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story
description: This true crime drama series explores the life and crimes of serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, revealing the systemic failures that allowed him to continue his killing spree for over a decade.

title: Planet Earth II
description: Narrated by Sir David Attenborough, this nature documentary series takes viewers on an extraordinary journey across the globe, showcasing Earth's diverse wildlife.

title: The Last Dance
description: This docuseries chronicles Michael Jordan's legendary career and his final season with the Chicago Bulls during their 1997-98 championship run.

title: Wild Wild Country
description: This series tells the story of the controversial Indian guru Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh, his community of followers, and the clash with the local government in Wasco County, Oregon.

title: Our Planet
description: Narrated by Sir David Attenborough, this nature documentary series explores the beauty of the natural world and the impact of climate change on Earth's ecosystems.
